import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const Play = ({ token }) => { const [ userData, setUserData ] = useState(); const [ inGame, setInGame ] = useState(false); const [ nightPhase, setNightPhase ] = useState(false); const [ morningPhase, setMorningPhase ] = useState(false); const Start = () => { setInGame(true); setMorningPhase(true); setNightPhase(false); } useEffect(() => { axios.post('http://localhost:5000/accounts/me', { token: token, }) .then(response => { setUserData(response.data); }); }, []) const players = [0]; while (players.length < 6) { const random = Math.floor((Math.random() * 6) + 1); if (players.indexOf(random) === -1) { players.push(random); } } return( <> { !inGame? : <> { !nightPhase && <>

{players.indexOf(7)}

} { !morningPhase && <> } } ); } export default Play;
